mapper.select: SELECT b.no, b.sprint_no, b.user_id, b.title, b.detail, b.status, b.reg_date, b.mod_date, b.project_no, u.image FROM backlog b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE sprint_no = #{sprint_no}

SELECT b.no, b.sprint_no, b.user_id, b.title, b.detail, b.status, b.reg_date, b.mod_date, b.project_no, u.image FROM backlog b JOIN user u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE sprint_no = 0 and project_no = #{project_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE backlog SET sprint_no = #{sprint_no} WHERE sprint_no = 0 AND no = #{no}
UPDATE backlog SET sprint_no = 0 WHERE no = #{no} AND sprint_no = #{sprint_no}
mapper.select: select * from burndown where #{nowTime} <= end_date AND #{nowTime} >= start_date AND no = ori_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO burndown (sprint_no, lapse, start_date, end_date, reg_date, mod_date, task, done_job) SELECT #{no}, 1, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, NOW(), NOW(), (SELECT count(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = #{no} AND status NOT IN ("done")), (SELECT count(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = #{no} AND status IN ("done"))

INSERT INTO burndown(ori_no, reg_date, mod_date, sprint_no, lapse, start_date, end_date, task, done_job) SELECT #{no}, DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 9 HOUR), sprint_no, (select count(*) from burndown where ori_no = #{no}) + 1, start_date, end_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = #{sprint_no} AND status NOT IN ("done")), (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM backlog WHERE sprint_no = #{sprint_no} AND status IN ("done")) FROM burndown WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT no, ori_no, sprint_no, lapse, task, done_job, DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) + 1 AS sub_day, start_date, end_date, reg_date, mod_date FROM burndown WHERE sprint_no = #{sprint_no} ORDER BY ori_no
SELECT * FROM burndown WHERE sprint_no IN (SELECT distinct sprint_no FROM sprint WHERE project_no = 1) AND end_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 day) AND start_date < NOW() ORDER BY sprint_no;
